user-story.as-a: viewer who wants to revisit and promote favorite stories
user-story.i-want: to save stories to a wishlist and share deep linked previews with friends
user-story.so-that: I can return later to purchase and help others discover the maker

acceptance-criteria.criterion: "Save" button toggles wishlist state with optimistic UI, persists via Serverpod, and reflects status across sessions within 2 seconds.
Share sheet presents platform native options (iOS ShareSheet, Android Intent chooser) and copies deep link to clipboard with success confirmation.
Generated deep links include signed Firebase Dynamic Link, UTM parameters, maker attribution, expiry 24h, and open the corresponding story/section in-app/web.
Share previews render OG metadata (title, description, image) using `story-share-renderer@2025.10` Lambda; preview loads in ≤400ms p95.
Every share/save action emits analytics events (`story_shared`, `story_saved`) with schema defined in the tech spec and correlates with story feed metrics.
Rate limiting prevents more than 20 share tokens per user per hour; exceeding attempts return friendly error state with retry guidance.
Offline handling queues share/save requests and syncs within 10 seconds of reconnect.
QA sign-off confirms links operate correctly on iOS, Android, and mobile web, including deep link fallback to the App Store when app absent.

task.description: Update `toggle_story_save_use_case.dart` to call new Serverpod endpoint and handle optimistic UI with rollback on failure
Build `story_share_sheet.dart` widget invoking platform share sheets, clipboard operations, and preview thumbnails
Implement `generate_story_deep_link_use_case.dart` to call `story_share_endpoint.dart`, handle rate limiting (HTTP 429), and produce `ShareResponse` domain entity
Create Serverpod `story_share_endpoint.dart` with rate limiting (20/hour) using Redis token bucket and audit logging
Extend Lambda `story-share-renderer@2025.10` to fetch story assets and render OG metadata compliant with spec
Update Segment schemas and Datadog dashboards for `story_shared` and `story_saved` metrics with conversion goals
Execute cross-platform QA playbook verifying deep link routing, App Store fallback, and expirations
Validate offline queue with simulated airplane mode scenario and ensure sync within 10 seconds on reconnect

Epic 1 Story 1.1 – Viewer Authentication (for user identity in shares/saves)
